vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PrivateBank.cashOut (patch_0.sol#21-27):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_0.sol#23-26)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_0.sol#24)
